card.name: Twin Lis of the Divine Realm
card.text: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has double strike. If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, put that many plus one +1/+1 counters on that creature instead.

card.name: Lijing, the True Divinity
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Lijing, the True Divinity or another nontoken creature you control enters, choose one — • Create a 1/1 white Fox Spirit creature token. • Invigorate 1. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Ing'Wei of the Flood Realm
card.text: Hexproof Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, you may submerge that creature. (To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.) {1}{U}{U}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up.

card.name: Shigurei, the Floodbringer
card.text: Trample When Shigurei, the Floodbringer enters, up to three target permanents become colorless Island lands.

card.name: Tzelin of the Demon Realm
card.text: Tzelin of the Demon Realm can't block. Whenever a Demon you control enters, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Tzelin from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Lizhao, Lord of the Yaogu
card.text: Flying When Lizhao, Lord of the Yaogu enters, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped and under your control. When Lizhao dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Revive {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Xiusheng of the Dragon Realm
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{R}{R}. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste. Exile that token at end of combat. Ferocious — Whenever Xiusheng of the Dragon Realm attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Xiusheng gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Hao'Tai, the Ancient One
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Hao'Tai, the Ancient One deals combat damage to a player, exile the top four cards of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast instant, sorcery, and creature cards from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

card.name: Chiu of the Wild Realm
card.text: {G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {1}{G}{G}: Create Shimaru, the White Wolf, a legendary 3/3 green Wolf creature token with hexproof. {2}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Qiyan, Serpent of Seven Heads
card.text: Alpha (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.) Vigilance, reach, trample {4}{G}{G}, Exile Qiyan, Serpent of Seven Heads from your graveyard: Create seven 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Infuse the Apparatus
card.text: Exile all cards from your graveyard. You may search your library for any number of instant and/or sorcery cards with different names that share a name with one or more cards exiled this way and cast them without paying their mana costs, then shuffle. Exile Infuse the Apparatus.

card.name: Tyrannic Judgment
card.text: Each player chooses up to one permanent they control of each permanent type, then sacrifices the rest. (The permanent types are artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker.)

card.name: Gao'Wu, Master Soothsayer
card.text: First strike Creatures with power greater than Gao'Wu, Master Soothsayer's power can't attack.

card.name: Diao, Dragoon Captain
card.text: When Diao, Dragoon Captain enters, create three 1/1 red and white Warrior creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control attacks, invigorate 1. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Kiri, Cloudwalker
card.text: Lifelink Whenever a creature with power less than Kiri, Cloudwalker's power you control enters, you may pay {W}. If you do, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.name: Yujei, Crane Companion
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one — • Other creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. • Other creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Cou Ling of Many Tails
card.text: Alpha (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.) Flying {2}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by creatures with counters on them this turn.

card.name: General of the Folded Fan
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") {2}, Sacrifice an Idol: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Quell Mutiny
card.text: Destroy all nonlegendary creatures.

card.name: Call to Attention
card.text: Exile target nontoken creature. That creature's controller creates X 1/1 red and white Warrior creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.

card.name: Achieve Greatness
card.text: Invigorate 5. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put five +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Pon, Twister of Forms
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

card.name: Chian, Augury Adept
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets exactly one creature they don't control, you may copy that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Oshin, Keeper of the Shoal
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1} for each spell cast before it this turn.

card.name: Shojiro, the Wavewaker
card.text: When Shojiro, the Wavewaker enters, submerge up to eight target creatures your opponents control. (To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)

card.name: Sun Yun, Master of Self
card.text: If a creature entering the battlefield under your control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. {1}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Way of Kindred Mind
card.text: Create two Idol tokens, then counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each Idol you control. (They're artifacts with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Coax Under
card.text: Submerge each creature you control. At the beginning of the next end step, you may turn any number of face down creatures you control face up. (To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)

card.name: Artful Coercion
card.text: Gain control of target creature with the least power among creatures on the battlefield, then invigorate 2. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Mull Over
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them into your graveyard or back on top of your library in any order. Draw two cards.

card.name: Seng, Fevered Fanatic
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card and you lose 1 life. Then if you have six or fewer cards in hand, sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Kugoja, Perished Conduit
card.text: {3}{B}{B}: Return target Zombie creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever another creature you control enters from a graveyard or you revive a creature token, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste and menace until end of turn.

card.name: Kai'Jun, the Annihilator
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Revive {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Kai'Long, Dark Immolator
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses life equal to its power.

card.name: Admirer of the Lost
card.text: Menace Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Rise from the Depths
card.text: Submerge all creature cards in graveyards. (To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)

card.name: Rummage Through Remains
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Create an X/X black Zombie creature token, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Bane of the Folded Fan
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Undeath Comes
card.text: Creature cards in your graveyard have revive {2}{B}{B}. ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mieng, Who Dances With Dragons
card.text: Ferocious — Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater you control enters, Mieng, Who Dances With Dragons becomes a 4/4 Dragon creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Hatsuo, Honored General
card.text: First strike {1}{R}: Hatsuo, Honored General and other Warrior creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wun Su, Guru of the Staff
card.text: Trample Whenever Wun Su, Guru of the Staff deals combat to a player, you may create Wun Su's Staff, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +5/+5" and equip {5}, then attach it to Wun Su.

card.name: Tseng, Warden of the Peak
card.text: Flying Whenever you tap a Mountain for mana, add {R} and that land deals 1 damage to you. Whenever you tap a non-Mountain land for mana, that land deals 1 damage to Tseng, Warden of the Peak.

card.name: Crimson Hellmaw
card.text: Flying, haste When Crimson Hellmaw enters, it deals 3 damage to any target. Revive {5}{R}{R} ({5}{R}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Desecrate Antiquities
card.text: Destroy each artifact with mana value X or less, then create an Idol token for each artifact destroyed this way. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Recalibrate
card.text: Exile target instant or sorcery spell you control. Until end of turn, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost. When you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Overzealous Tutor
card.text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card. Put that card into your hand, then Overzealous Tutor deals damage to up to one target creature equal to the number of cards you own in exile.

card.name: Brutal Descent
card.text: Choose target creature. Brutal Descent deals 2 damage to each creature other than the chosen creature. Ferocious — If the chosen creature has power 4 or greater, Brutal Descent deals 4 damage to each creature other than the chosen creature instead.

card.name: Jiayin, the Harmonious
card.text: Reach Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of an instant or sorcery spell, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Kou, Primal Shepherd
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever you sacrifice an Idol, draw a card.

card.name: Jindao, the Coiled Prophet
card.text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. At the beginning of your first main phase, add {G}{G} for each land card among cards on top of libraries. Jindao, the Coiled Prophet gets +2/+2 for each creature card among cards on top of libraries.

card.name: Xiejuan, the Regal Beast
card.text: Alpha (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.) When Xiejuan, the Regal Beast becomes alpha, draw a card for each other creature you control.

card.name: Sonwu, the Mighty
card.text: Alpha (You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, untap all lands you control.

card.name: Loamwrecker
card.text: Trample Whenever a land you control becomes tapped, Loamwrecker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Germination
card.text: Gain control of target land.

card.name: Savage Congregation
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with total mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Pecking Order
card.text: {G}, Discard a noncreature card: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among them into your hand, where X is the discarded card's mana value plus one. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: The First Idol
card.text: Whenever The First Idol attacks, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Sacrifice three Idols: Return The First Idol from your graveyard your hand.

card.name: Assassin's Shuriken
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch and "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control. Sacrifice Assassin's Shuriken." Equip {2}

card.name: Inspiring Effigy
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Inspiring Effigy: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Sacred Sanctuary
card.text: ({T}: Add {W}.) Sacred Sanctuary enters tapped with two sanctum counters on it. {T}, Remove a sanctum counter from Sacred Sanctuary: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Inundated Sanctuary
card.text: ({T}: Add {U}.) Inundated Sanctuary enters tapped with two sanctum counters on it. {T}, Remove a sanctum counter from Inundated Sanctuary: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Wretched Sanctuary
card.text: ({T}: Add {B}.) Wretched Sanctuary enters tapped with two sanctum counters on it. {T}, Remove a sanctum counter from Wretched Sanctuary: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Spire Sanctuary

card.name: Savage Sanctuary
card.text: ({T}: Add {G}.) Savage Sanctuary enters tapped with two sanctum counters on it. {T}, Remove a sanctum counter from Savage Sanctuary: Add {R} or {W}.

card.text: Flying Whenever Crane Legionnaire attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Warchief of the Folded Fan

card.name: Join the Flock
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Battle Acumen
card.text: Invigorate 1 three times. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Surging Stream
card.text: Submerge up to two target attacking nontoken creatures an opponent controls. (To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)

card.name: Chords of Order
card.text: Enchant creature When Chords of Order enters, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, tap up to one target creature without a +1/+1 counter on it, then untap up to one target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: The Charmer's Curse
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Yawning Crane
card.text: Flying Whenever Yawning Crane deals combat damage to an opponent, target tapped creature that player controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may switch Master of Tranquility's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.text: Flying When Mother of Owls dies, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Barterer of Passage
card.text: {1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn by creatures with less power. {1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn by creatures with greater power.

card.name: Warrior's Perspective
card.text: When Warrior's Perspective enters, invigorate 1. (Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes tapped, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Pitiless Judgment
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature card from it and exile that card. Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead choose a nonland card from their hand and exile that card.

card.name: Disinter
card.text: Cast this spell only if each graveyard has a creature card in it. Each player puts a creature card in their graveyard of an opponent's choice onto the battlefield.
